function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of 5G video and AR glasses for remote medical care may lead to overreliance on technology and reduced in-person interaction, impacting patient care and doctor-patient relationships.","Impact":"Reduced quality of patient care, diminished doctor-patient relationships, and potential misdiagnosis due to limited in-person interaction.","Mitigation":"Implement training for doctors on managing remote medical care and emphasize the importance of in-person assessments when necessary.","Technologies":"Training modules for remote medical care, guidelines for in-person assessments, and telemedicine support systems.","People":"Patients, doctors, healthcare staff","Owner":"Hospital management, healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Deployment of 5G-based intelligent service robots may result in reduced human interaction, potentially impacting social connections and mental health of patients and visitors.","Impact":"Reduced human interaction, potential social isolation, and impact on mental health for patients and visitors.","Mitigation":"Introduce guidelines for balanced use of robots and human interaction, implement social support programs for patients, and provide training for staff on supporting patient well-being.","Technologies":"Guidelines for robot-human interaction, social support programs, and staff training modules.","People":"Patients, visitors, healthcare staff","Owner":"Hospital management, healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Use of 5G-based thermal imaging for human body temperature measurement may result in privacy concerns and data security risks.","Impact":"Privacy breaches, data security risks, and potential misuse of personal information.","Mitigation":"Implement strict data privacy policies, ensure secure storage and transmission of data, and provide transparent information to the public about the use of thermal imaging technology.","Technologies":"Data privacy policies, encryption technologies, and transparency initiatives.","People":"General public, travelers, individuals passing through screening points","Owner":"Government authorities, technology providers"}]}
